title: The Book of Manners for Today's Teens
description: Finally, a book for teens and their parents to enjoy. Life just became a little less difficult! This book tackles a host of issues for the toughest crowed Generations X, Y and Z. Gloria Franklin draws on her experience as teen pageant director and youth motivator to provide a common sense approach to things every teen needs to basic manners and common courtesywhat to wear and when, what not to wear and why!the do¿s and don¿ts in private and public placeshow to act in most social and formal settingshow to handle situations with family, friends or total strangers and subjects that adults are sometimes afraid to matters of disrespectsagging pants and micro skirtstattoos and boldly colored haircell phone usage and loud musicpersonal hygiene and professional hygienebeing a lady, gentleman or a barbarian Topics covered in this book can be used as a quick reference guide for schools, churches, youth groups and more. Gloria Franklin resides in Chicago and is working on her next book which will address even more matters of etiquette and how teens can successfully manage in a business setting.Visit her on the web at www.rayofhopepublishing.com
author: Gloria Franklin
